identity.philosophy: Fusion over Imitation. Emotion First. Asymmetry. Texture > Gloss.

headings.usage: Page titles, Subject names, Level indicators

mono.usage: Timers, XP values, Stats, Progress percentages

visual_enhancers.texture: Add a fixed 'noise' overlay at 2% opacity to the entire body to kill the digital flatness.
visual_enhancers.shadows: Use 'shadow-sm' for cards, but 'shadow-[4px_4px_0px_0px_rgba(0,0,0,1)]' for primary buttons (Neo-Brutalist touch).
visual_enhancers.borders: All cards must have 'border border-stone-200'. No floating borderless cards.
visual_enhancers.glass: Header must be 'bg-white/80 backdrop-blur-md border-b border-stone-200'.

SubjectCard.style: Card with top colored border (subject color). Image used as a subtle watermark or header background. Progress bar prominent at bottom.

XPBar.style: Thick bar (h-4 or h-6). Striped animated background for 'filling' effect. Display 'Level X' prominently.

PomodoroTimer.style: Floating or Fixed widget. Large Mono font for numbers. Circular progress indicator.

AchievementBadge.style: Hexagonal or Circular frame. Grayscale when locked, Full color + Glow when unlocked.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Install 'lucide-react' for icons (Zap, Trophy, Clock, CheckCircle, BookOpen).
2. Use 'recharts' for the Overall Progress chart (Simple RadialBar or PieChart).
3. Implement the 'Bento' grid layout strictly. Do not make everything equal width.
4. Use the provided image URLs as 'cover' images for subject cards (height 120px, object-cover).
5. Ensure the 'Pomodoro Timer' persists or is easily accessible from any page.
7. Theme: LIGHT MODE ONLY. Do not implement dark mode toggle unless requested. Focus on the 'Stone/Paper' aesthetic.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
